dict.string: COPY MY DATA FROM BUILDING SENTENCES
You should really complete Building Sentences first.
You may copy your data arrays from Building Sentences.
Use string interpolation to build a sentence pattern, putting in the different parts of speech; for example, `\(verb)`.
Replace some of the words in the arrays with your own. Just be sure to put them in the correct array, or the sentence wonâ€™t make sense.
